author: ws
content:
five organizations — Clean Ocean Action, Protect Our Coast NJ, Save Long Beach Island, Defend Brigantine Beach and the Long Island Commercial Fishing Association — are calling on President Joe Biden to investigate the whale deaths and freeze all offshore wind activities along New Jersey and its neighboring states.

https://www.app.com/story/news/local/land-environment/2023/01/10/nj-activists-demand-investigation-into-flurry-of-dead-whales/69790489007/

author: ws
content:
So sad ;-(

This summer whale sightings from the Monmouth county beaches magnificent!

author: Ginny Jones
content:
Just was given a copy of WHALE SONG about Hump Back whales — what amazing creatures!

Ginny Jones
